summary: TAKATA RECALL - AIR BAG LIGHT POPPED ON WHEN CAR WAS STATIONARY.  TOOK IT INTO THE TOYOTA DEALER TO CHECK IT OUT. THE DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF THE PROBLEM FROM THE DEALER IS THAT THE AIR BAG IN PASSENGER SEAT HAS AN INTERMITTENT OPEN.  CAN I GET AN APPROVAL VOUCHER TO FIX THIS AIR BAG AT NO COST?  THE QUOTED AMOUNT TO GET THIS FIXED IS $827.10 PLUS TAX.
